knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
# Set the genotypes
genotypes <- c("AA", "aa", "Aa")

# Probability of 'AA'
prob_AA <- 0.4

# Probability of 'aa'
prob_aa <- 0.1

prob_Aa <- 0.5

# Number of offspring to simulate
num_offspring <- 100

# Combine probabilities
combined_probabilities <- c(prob_AA, prob_aa, prob_Aa)

# Simulate genetic inheritance with combined probabilities
offspring_genotypes <- sample(genotypes, size = num_offspring, replace = TRUE, prob = combined_probabilities)

print(offspring_genotypes)

# Count the occurrences of each genotype
genotype_counts <- table(offspring_genotypes)

# Display the counts
print(genotype_counts)
```
